name: luminous-moss
effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, it consumes this item and raises its Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, raises its Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.
